verses.verse: Peter, <S%G4074><s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the <S%G3927>strangers<s%> scattered <S%G1290>throughout<s%> <S%G4195>Pontus,<s%> <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2587>Cappadocia,<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G978>Bithynia,<s%>

Elect <S%G1588><s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4268>foreknowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4473>sprinkling<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied.<s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> which <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4183>abundant<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> hath begotten us <S%G313>again<s%> <S%G2248><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> a <S%G2198>lively<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%>

To <S%G1519><s%> an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G862>incorruptible,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G283>undefiled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that fadeth not <S%G263>away,<s%> <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G2248>you,<s%>

Who are <S%G5432>kept<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye greatly <S%G21>rejoice,<s%> though <S%G737>now<s%> for a <S%G3641>season,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> need <S%G1163>be,<s%> <S%G2076><s%> ye are in <S%G3076>heaviness<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G4164>manifold<s%> temptations: <S%G3986><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1383>trial<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> being <S%G4183>much<s%> more <S%G5093>precious<s%> than of <S%G5553>gold<s%> that <S%G622>perisheth,<s%> <S%G1161>though<s%> it be <S%G1381>tried<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%> might be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>appearing<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> having <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>seen,<s%> ye <S%G25>love;<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom,<s%> though <S%G737>now<s%> ye <S%G3708>see<s%> him <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4100>believing,<s%> ye <S%G21>rejoice<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G412>unspeakable<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> full of glory: <S%G1392><s%>
Receiving <S%G2865><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> even the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> of your <S%G5590>souls.<s%>

Of <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> have <S%G1567>inquired<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> searched <S%G1830>diligently,<s%> who <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> that should come <S%G1519>unto<s%> you: <S%G5209><s%>

Searching <S%G2045><s%> <S%G5101>what,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> what <S%G4169>manner<s%> of <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> which was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> did <S%G1213>signify,<s%> when it testified <S%G4303>beforehand<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> that should <S%G3326>follow.<s%> <S%G5023><s%>

Unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G601>revealed,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> they did <S%G1247>minister<s%> the <S%G846>things,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G312>reported<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> them that have preached the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> unto <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> sent <S%G649>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> which <S%G3739>things<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G3879>look<s%> <S%G1519>into.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> gird <S%G328>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3751>loins<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1271>mind,<s%> be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> and <S%G1679>hope<s%> to the <S%G5049>end<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is to be <S%G5342>brought<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G5218>obedient<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> fashioning <S%G4964>yourselves<s%> according to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4386>former<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> ignorance: <S%G52><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> he which hath <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> is <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G846>ye<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>manner<s%> of <S%G391>conversation;<s%>
Because <S%G1360><s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1096>Be<s%> ye <S%G40>holy;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G40>holy.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye call <S%G1941>on<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> who without respect of persons <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> <S%G678><s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to every <S%G1538>man's<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G390>pass<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3940>sojourning<s%> here <S%G1722>in<s%> fear: <S%G5401><s%>

Forasmuch as ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye were <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3084>redeemed<s%> with corruptible <S%G5349>things,<s%> as <S%G694>silver<s%> <S%G2228>and<s%> <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3152>vain<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> received by tradition from your <S%G3970>fathers;<s%>
But <S%G235><s%> with the <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of a <S%G286>lamb<s%> without <S%G299>blemish<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without spot: <S%G784><s%>

Who <S%G3303>verily<s%> was <S%G4267>foreordained<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> was <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> these <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%>

Who <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> do <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> that raised him <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory;<s%> <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Seeing ye have <S%G48>purified<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5218>obeying<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> love of the <S%G5360>brethren,<s%> see that ye <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> fervently: <S%G1619><s%>

Being born <S%G313>again,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G4701>seed,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of <S%G862>incorruptible,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> which <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1519>forever.<s%> <S%G165><s%>

For <S%G1360><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5528>grass,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> of <S%G5528>grass.<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%> <S%G3583>withereth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> falleth away: <S%G1601><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3306>endureth<s%> <S%G1519>forever.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> which by the gospel is <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>
